Packages that use CaptchaException
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy This package a struture for implementing gimpys
A gimpy is PixCaptcha with the question "Spell the word".  
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage this package provides implementations of the WordToImage interface. 
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.textpaster implementations of AbstractTextPaster
